artist: Artist: Eisen; Publisher: Published by Izumiya Ichibei
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription:
美艶仙女香といふ，坂本氏の製する白粉の名の高きに美人をよせて 白粉に花の香のある美人かな 東西庵南北

{Bien-sennyokō} (famous powder) produced by Sakamoto, made for beauties:
{Bien-Sennyōkō to yū, Sakamoto shi no sei suru oshiroi no nadakaki ni bijin wo yosete}

(Her face powder is
scented with floral fragrance.
How beautiful she is!)

{Oshiroi ni
Hana no ka no aru
Bijin kana}

by Tōzai-an Nanboku
markings: Censor seal: 極 {kiwame}; publisher\'s seal: {Izumiichi}; artist\'s seal
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Putting on Face Powder
